name: Super Shot!
description:
Super Shot!

This is a "Super Hot" fan game! The unfortunately cancelled game contains 5 Levels

"Time goes with your movement"

Remember to leave a rating of the game. Was it terrible or perfecto i don't care, as long as you leave your honest rating.

Important!

Here are the game controls that aren't in the game!

When no "Ammo" back you can throw your gun, by using right click on your mouse.

if you have no gun back you punch your enemy! Go close and use your mouse to punch!
